channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Watch How a Hacker’s Infrared Laser Can Spy on Your Laptop’s Keystrokes
item.description: Hacker Samy Kamkar is debuting his own open source version of a laser microphone—a spy tool that can invisibly pick up the sounds inside your home through a window, and even the text you’re typing.

item.title: UK launches formal probe into Amazon’s ties with AI startup Anthropic
item.description: The U.K.’s antitrust regulator has confirmed that it’s carrying out a formal antitrust investigation into Amazon’s ties with Anthropic, after Amazon recently completed a $4 billion investment into the AI startup. The news comes a week after the Competition and Markets Authority (CMA) revealed it was launching an invitation to comment into Google’s own ties with […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Generative AI Has a 'Shoplifting' Problem. This Startup CEO Has a Plan to Fix It
item.description: Bill Gross’ ProRata, which has struck deals with partners like Time and Universal Music Group, has a strategy for making AI powerhouses pay for content.

item.title: AI business agent startup Bardeen pulls in strategic investment from Dropbox and Hubspot
item.description: Bardeen has raised $3M to build its platform that uses a natural language interface to automate repetitive knowledge work. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: The Trump Campaign Is All In on Dude-Bro Politics
item.description: While Tim Walz models a traditional yet empathetic masculinity and White Dudes for Harris raise millions, Donald Trump is appearing on fratty streams in an effort to turn out the most reluctant voters.

item.title: Bilingual dictation assistant Silvia understands ‘Spanglish’ and other language mixtures
item.description: Natural language AI assistants tend to be excellent English speakers, and passable in other tongues — but if you are one of the millions who fluidly switch between two languages on the fly, they’re stumped. A new AI helper called Silvia, however, understands “Spanglish” just fine, with more language combos to come. The app — […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: As Skies Fill With Space Junk, Nonprofit Urges US to Pause StarLink Launches
item.description: The advocacy group PIRG is asking the US government to conduct environmental reviews of commercial internet satellites. The group’s new report warns of a space garbage problem with Earthly consequences.

item.title: Indian conglomerate Reliance slashed over 42,000 jobs last financial year
item.description: Reliance, India's largest conglomerate, reduced its workforce by 11%, or more than 42,000 people, in the financial year ended March 2024. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Palmer Luckey’s Defense Startup, Anduril, Raises $1.5 Billion to Produce AI-Powered Weapons
item.description: The company plans to build a Tesla-style, software-optimized factory to manufacture autonomous drones and other battlefield tech.

item.title: Anduril raises $1.5B at a $14B valuation
item.description: The Palmer Luckey-founded defense startup wants to become a serious rival to longstanding kingpins, and has been clocking some big wins. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.
